overview: Sam took to market OEMsecrets.com in June 2010 and has gone on to oversee the launch of new products such as the BOM Machine and Mydatsheet.com. He managed OEMsecrets’ successful stand at the Electronica trade in Munich in 2010, which brought acclaim for its originality and atmosphere. Sam graduated from Leeds Metropolitan Univeristy with 1st Class Honours in Ba (hons) Marketing and Advertising Management in June 2012. He has a passion for sports including skiing, wakeboarding, rugby, football, boxing, tennis and squash.
